title: SKT Kalista??????
body:
They give a skin to a champion who has a 44% win rate and is NO WHERE to be seen in any games i've never seen a kalista since uhh season 5 when she was strong then they nerfed her to the ground super hard... so does this mean she might be getting some buffs atleast cause god forbid i would love every adc to be played not just Jhin, Ashe or Lucian every game it gets really annoying. 

The last SKT skin for sivir is heaps better at least she can be played and not get shat on...

ps. It's a nice skin but she is just so awful right now

replies.body:
its not about who is good right now. The Team skins are supposed to represent the champions that were influential during Worlds and/or the winners favourite champions.

> At the time we decided to re-work the skins, we weren’t sure if we’d be able to get Kalista done. She had a different skin in production at the time and this meant adding a completely new skin (in addition to Azir) at a time we hadn’t planned for one (let alone two).** But after listening to all of you (and Bang)** we knew we had an opportunity to really get this right. So, we added the Kalista skin and we hope you’re as happy as we are with it!
